actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Environment and Public Works, S. Rept. 95-154.
Placed on Calendar in Senate under Measures Cleared to be Considered by Unanimous Consent.
Measure indefinitely postponed in Senate (similar provisions in H.R. 6197 as passed Senate).

official_title: A bill to amend the Disaster Relief Act to extend authorizations for the Federal disaster assistance program.

summary.text: Amends the Disaster Relief Act of 1974 to extend indefinitely authorizations for the Federal disaster assistance program.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Disaster Relief Act to extend authorizations for the Federal disaster assistance program.
